attributes.action: I would like help in getting cats the respect after being ran over they deserve
attributes.background: I would like help in getting 10,000 signatures because I think cats/kittens who have been run over by vehicles should be fined with a fixed penalty charge as a cat/kitten are still Family just like dogs and cost us money like dogs do so I demand cats should be treated with more respect.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200529
